name: Tylenol
description: Used to relieve pain and reduce fever.

description: Provides relief from pain, inflammation, and fever.

description: Helps lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.

description: Prescribed for managing type 2 diabetes by controlling blood sugar levels.

description: Used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) and stomach ulcers.

name: Ventolin
description: A bronchodilator used to relieve bronchospasm in conditions such as asthma.

name: Xanax
description: Prescribed to manage anxiety disorders and panic attacks.

description: Prevents blood clots in patients with heart conditions or after a stroke.

description: Treats hypothyroidism by supplementing low thyroid hormone levels.

name: Cymbalta
description: Used for treating depression, anxiety, and chronic pain conditions.

description: Treats autoimmune conditions like rheumatoid arthritis and Crohn's disease.

description: An antidepressant used to treat depression, OCD, and panic disorder.

name: Glucophage
description: Alternative brand for Metformin to control blood sugar in diabetes.

name: Fosamax
description: Used to treat and prevent osteoporosis by strengthening bones.

name: Coumadin
description: An anticoagulant (blood thinner) used to prevent blood clots.

name: Allegra
description: Relieves seasonal allergy symptoms like sneezing and itchy nose.

name: Paracetamol
description: Used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever.

name: Ibuprofen
description: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) for pain, fever, and inflammation.

name: Cetirizine
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose and itchy eyes.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Helps lower cholesterol levels and reduce the risk of heart disease.

name: Amoxicillin
description: A broad-spectrum antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.

name: Metformin
description: Used to control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

name: Omeprazole
description: A proton pump inhibitor that reduces stomach acid and treats GERD.

name: Salbutamol
description: A bronchodilator used to relieve symptoms of asthma and other lung conditions.

name: Alprazolam
description: Used to treat anxiety and panic disorders.

name: Lisinopril
description: An ACE inhibitor used to manage high blood pressure and heart failure.

name: Rosuvastatin
description: Used to lower cholesterol and prevent cardiovascular disease.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Prevents blood clots in patients with cardiovascular conditions.

name: Levothyroxine
description: Treats hypothyroidism by replacing thyroid hormones.

name: Duloxetine
description: Used for depression, anxiety, and chronic pain management.

name: Adalimumab
description: Treats autoimmune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis and psoriasis.

name: Fluoxetine
description: An SSRI antidepressant used for depression, OCD, and panic disorders.

name: Metoprolol
description: A beta-blocker that manages high blood pressure and angina.

name: Warfarin
description: An anticoagulant used to prevent and treat blood clots.

name: Fexofenadine
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: A diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.
